response.original_title: The Polls Don't Lie: The Making of "You're Not Elected, Charlie Brown"
response.overview: This featurette will explore the political leanings (or lack thereof) of its producers, as well as the way in which they set out to create a politically-themed piece within the realm of Peanuts.
response.tagline: The Polls Don't Lie: The Making of "You're Not Elected, Charlie Brown"
response.title: The Polls Don't Lie: The Making of "You're Not Elected, Charlie Brown"
